mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT year FROM budget_monthly ORDER BY year ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO budget_monthly (csp, year, month, project_cd, budget, currency) VALUES (#{csp}, #{year}, #{month}, #{projectId}, #{budget}, #{currency}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE budget = VALUES(budget), currency = VALUES(currency), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.select:
SELECT ms.year_month COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci AS yearMonth, 'AWS' COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci AS csp, COALESCE(SUM(ms.total_cost), 0) AS bill FROM monthly_summation ms WHERE ms.year_month >= CONCAT(#{year}, '01') AND ms.year_month <= CONCAT(#{year}, '12') AND ms.project_cd = #{projectId} GROUP BY ms.year_month
UNION ALL
SELECT vm_latest.demand_month COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci AS yearMonth, 'NCP' COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci AS csp, COALESCE(SUM(vm_latest.demand_amount), 0) / 1400.0 AS bill FROM ( SELECT n1.demand_month, n1.demand_amount, n1.member_no FROM ncp_cost_service_month n1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT product_demand_type, demand_month, MAX(write_date) AS latest_write_date FROM ncp_cost_service_month WHERE demand_month >= CONCAT(#{year}, '01') AND demand_month <= CONCAT(#{year}, '12') GROUP BY product_demand_type, demand_month ) n2 ON n1.product_demand_type = n2.product_demand_type AND n1.demand_month = n2.demand_month AND n1.write_date = n2.latest_write_date ) vm_latest INNER JOIN servicegroup_meta sm ON vm_latest.member_no COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci = sm.csp_account COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci AND sm.csp_type = 'NCP' AND sm.service_cd = #{projectId} GROUP BY vm_latest.demand_month
UNION ALL
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.usage_date, '%Y%m') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci AS yearMonth, 'Azure' COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci AS csp, COALESCE(SUM(a.pre_tax_cost), 0) / 1400.0 AS bill FROM azure_cost_service_daily a INNER JOIN servicegroup_meta sm ON a.subscription_id COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci = sm.csp_account COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci AND sm.csp_type = 'AZURE' AND sm.service_cd = #{projectId} WHERE a.usage_date >= CONCAT(#{year}, '0101') AND a.usage_date <= CONCAT(#{year}, '1231') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.usage_date, '%Y%m')
ORDER BY yearMonth ASC, csp ASC
